resources.post: Leon asks “Why do people duck ALL the information that is available about the Shroud?” That is a good question – because if some of that information were presented in the CNN Finding Jesus episode on the Shroud – it would be clear that the proposed theory of the shroud as a medieval photography with hand painted blood doesn’t fly. There’s plenty of info to disprove that theory. Some of it is listed here: http://rationalfaith.com/2015/03/finding jesus the shroud a review/.
